name: Haunted Mansion (itch) (fiabot)
description:
Being a ghost on Halloween is hard work! Decorate a haunted house as best you can before the time runs out. 

Use WASD or arrow keys to move, the number pad to go through inventory, and E to  interact with the environment Whem you fined a supply it will be added to your inventory.  Decorations must be mutated in order! 

Each level is procedurally generated!
